QuestData.Title: The Absent-Minded Prospector
QuestData.Description: Who are you again? $n? Have we met? If you're here from the League, you can tell them I'm not leaving! Not without my find. I had it, right in my hands! Then the screaming. Then the wetness.$B$BListen here whos-yer-name, I documented the whole thing in my journal the day the tidal wave hit. And I know just where I left it! The journal. Not the find. Help me get the one so we can get the other! Or vice-versa! Do you follow? Follow me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the confused Prospector Remtravel to his missing journal. Talk to Jr. Archaeologist Ferd at the dig site when you're done.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Talk to Jr. Archaeologist Ferd at Remtravel's Excavation in Darkshore.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you've helped the Prospector find his missing journal! To think it was here all along.$B$BSomeday you'll have to show me this other set of ruins he's always going on about.
